title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: Column icons fail to display when connecting to a Derby database in the specified steps.
OB: Column icons are not visible in the Data Explorer view after connecting to a Derby database.
EB: Column icons should be visible in the Data Explorer view after successfully connecting to a Derby database.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Generate a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, establish a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After configuring the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query.
